---

# Activity List: ADPA - Advanced Document Processing & Automation Framework

---

## Document Overview

**Purpose:**  
This Activity List decomposes the ADPA project’s work packages into specific, actionable, and measurable activities. It serves as an operational plan to guide team members, support resource allocation, and enable tracking toward project objectives.

**Scope:**  
Covers all major phases: Planning & Requirements, Core Development, Integration, Testing & QA, Deployment, and Documentation, aligned with BABOK v3, PMBOK 7th Edition, and DMBOK 2.0 standards.

**Relationship to WBS:**  
Each activity is mapped to a WBS work package, with unique IDs and traceability to the WBS Dictionary. Activities represent the lowest level of work in the project hierarchy.

**Methodology:**  
- Work packages identified from WBS and project roadmap.
- Activities defined to be atomic, assignable, measurable, and standards-compliant.
- Each activity includes deliverables, effort, required skills, dependencies, and assumptions.

---

## Activity Definitions

---

### Project Phase: Planning & Requirements

#### Work Package: WBS-1.1 – Project Initiation

| **Activity ID** | **Activity Name**                       | **Description**                                                                                                       | **Deliverable**                         | **Effort Estimate** | **Skills Required**                 | **Constraints**                              | **Assumptions**                      |
|-----------------|-----------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------|---------------------|--------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------|
| ACT-001         | Develop Project Charter                  | Draft, review, and finalize the Project Charter in compliance with PMBOK 7.                                          | Project Charter Document (Markdown/PDF)  | 8 hours             | Project Manager, BA                  | Must use ADPA CLI/API for generation         | Stakeholders available for review     |
| ACT-002         | Identify Stakeholders                    | Generate and validate Stakeholder Register using ADPA’s standards-compliant modules.                                 | Stakeholder Register                     | 6 hours             | Business Analyst                      | Input from all project leads required        | Access to org charts & contacts       |
| ACT-003         | Gather Initial Requirements              | Elicit, record, and structure high-level requirements per BABOK v3.                                                   | Requirements Documentation               | 12 hours            | Business Analyst, SME                 | Stakeholder interviews must be scheduled     | Stakeholders will participate         |
| ACT-004         | Analyze Compliance Requirements          | Identify and document regulatory, security, and industry compliance requirements (GDPR, SOX, etc.).                   | Compliance Requirements Matrix           | 6 hours             | Compliance Analyst                    | Access to regulatory documentation           | Up-to-date standards are available    |

#### Work Package: WBS-1.2 – Detailed Planning

| **Activity ID** | **Activity Name**                       | **Description**                                                                                                       | **Deliverable**                         | **Effort Estimate** | **Skills Required**                 | **Constraints**                              | **Assumptions**                      |
|-----------------|-----------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------|---------------------|--------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------|
| ACT-005         | Develop Work Breakdown Structure (WBS)  | Decompose project into WBS (3-4 levels), create WBS Dictionary, and validate with stakeholders.                      | WBS & WBS Dictionary Documents           | 10 hours            | Project Manager, BA                   | Must use ADPA’s enhanced WBS generator       | All modules/features are identified   |
| ACT-006         | Define Activity List                    | Identify and document all activities for each work package (this document).                                          | Activity List (this document)            | 6 hours             | Project Manager, BA                   | Needs finalized WBS as input                 | WBS will not change significantly     |
| ACT-007         | Create Schedule Network Diagram         | Develop schedule network diagrams using ADPA’s processor; identify dependencies and critical path.                    | Network Diagram (visual/text)            | 8 hours             | Scheduler, PM, Dev Lead                | Requires WBS and Activity List completion     | Resource availability is known        |
| ACT-008         | Develop Resource & Cost Estimates       | Estimate resources, assign roles, and forecast costs using ADPA tools.                                                | Resource & Cost Estimate Sheets          | 8 hours             | PM, Finance, Tech Leads                 | Needs inputs from all leads                   | Rates and resource calendars defined  |

### Project Phase: Core Development

#### Work Package: WBS-2.1 – AI Processing Engine

| **Activity ID** | **Activity Name**                       | **Description**                                                                                                       | **Deliverable**                         | **Effort Estimate** | **Skills Required**                 | **Constraints**                              | **Assumptions**                      |
|-----------------|-----------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------|---------------------|--------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------|
| ACT-009         | Implement Multi-Provider AI Orchestration | Integrate OpenAI, Google AI, GitHub Copilot, and Ollama; enable automatic failover.                                  | AI Orchestration Module                  | 24 hours            | AI Engineer, Node.js Dev              | Provider API keys required                    | Providers offer stable APIs           |
| ACT-010         | Develop Intelligent Context Management   | Build context injection and smart prompt processing features.                                                         | Context Management Component             | 16 hours            | AI Engineer, TypeScript Dev            | Requires AI orchestration foundation          | Project context models are defined    |
| ACT-011         | Integrate Few-Shot Learning System       | Implement few-shot prompt selection and example management as per architecture.                                       | Few-Shot Learning Module                 | 12 hours            | AI Engineer, TypeScript Dev            | Few-shot examples database must be ready      | Examples are available                |

#### Work Package: WBS-2.2 – Document Generator

| **Activity ID** | **Activity Name**                       | **Description**                                                                                                       | **Deliverable**                         | **Effort Estimate** | **Skills Required**                 | **Constraints**                              | **Assumptions**                      |
|-----------------|-----------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------|---------------------|--------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------|
| ACT-012         | Build Template-Based Document Generator  | Create and maintain document templates for all supported standards (BABOK, PMBOK, DMBOK).                            | Document Generator Engine                | 20 hours            | TypeScript Dev, BA, PM                | Template specs must be finalized              | Standard templates are accessible     |
| ACT-013         | Implement Document Output Formats        | Support Markdown, PDF, and JSON outputs using Adobe SDK; test for standards compliance.                              | Multi-format Document Output             | 12 hours            | Node.js Dev, PDF Specialist            | Adobe credentials/licenses required           | PDF SDK is compatible                 |
| ACT-014         | Develop Automated Workflow Pipelines     | Design and automate end-to-end document generation workflows with error handling and logging.                        | Workflow Automation Scripts              | 10 hours            | DevOps Engineer, Node.js Dev            | Requires all above components implemented     | Logging solution is in place          |

#### Work Package: WBS-2.3 – REST API Server

| **Activity ID** | **Activity Name**                       | **Description**                                                                                                       | **Deliverable**                         | **Effort Estimate** | **Skills Required**                 | **Constraints**                              | **Assumptions**                      |
|-----------------|-----------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------|---------------------|--------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------|
| ACT-015         | Develop Express.js API Server           | Build REST API server with endpoints for document generation, templates listing, publishing, etc.                    | API Server Application                   | 16 hours            | Node.js Dev, API Specialist             | TypeSpec API specs must be available          | Swagger/OpenAPI docs are up-to-date   |
| ACT-016         | Generate & Maintain OpenAPI Specs        | Use TypeSpec to generate and update OpenAPI specifications, ensure Swagger UI is available.                          | OpenAPI Specs, Swagger UI                | 8 hours             | API Specialist, TypeSpec Dev             | Needs close coordination with API changes     | TypeSpec tools are configured         |

|-----------------|-----------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------|---------------------|--------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------|
| ACT-017         | Implement Confluence Integration         | Enable direct publishing of documents to Atlassian Confluence via API and CLI.                                       | Confluence Integration Module            | 10 hours            | Node.js Dev, Atlassian Specialist        | Confluence API access/config required         | Access credentials are valid          |
| ACT-018         | Implement SharePoint Integration         | Enable document management and upload to Microsoft SharePoint.                                                        | SharePoint Integration Module            | 10 hours            | Node.js Dev, Microsoft 365 Specialist     | SharePoint API access/config required         | SharePoint endpoints are active       |
| ACT-019         | Integrate Adobe Document Services        | Connect Adobe PDF generation and document intelligence features.                                                      | Adobe Integration Scripts                | 8 hours             | Node.js Dev, Adobe SDK Specialist         | Adobe account required                         | SDK is compatible with environment    |
| ACT-020         | Develop CLI & Web Admin Interface        | Refine CLI (Yargs-based) and Next.js web admin portal for user/admin interactions.                                   | CLI & Web Admin Interface                | 12 hours            | TypeScript Dev, UX/UI Designer            | Next.js and CLI frameworks must be in place   | UI/UX requirements are clear          |

| ACT-022         | Validate Regulatory Compliance           | Conduct audits for GDPR, SOX, Basel III, MiFID II, etc.; generate compliance reports.                                | Compliance Audit Reports                  | 10 hours            | Compliance Analyst, Auditor                | All regulatory documentation must be accessible| Up-to-date standards are available    |

### Project Phase: Testing & Quality Assurance

#### Work Package: WBS-4.1 – Testing & QA

|-----------------|-----------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------|---------------------|--------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------|
| ACT-023         | Develop Unit & Integration Tests         | Write unit and integration tests for all modules using Jest and TypeScript.                                           | Test Suites (.spec.ts files)             | 14 hours            | QA Engineer, TypeScript Dev               | All modules must be implemented               | Test coverage standards are defined   |
| ACT-024         | Conduct Provider & Performance Testing   | Test all AI providers (Azure, GitHub, Google, Ollama) and overall system performance.                                | Test Reports                             | 10 hours            | QA Engineer, AI Engineer                   | Access to all providers required              | Test data sets are available          |
| ACT-025         | Perform Security & Compliance Testing    | Run security, authentication, and compliance validation tests.                                                       | Security & Compliance Test Reports        | 8 hours             | Security Tester, Compliance Analyst         | Needs coordination with security implementation| Penetration tools are available       |
| ACT-026         | User Acceptance Testing (UAT)            | Prepare UAT scripts, coordinate with stakeholders, and collect feedback.                                             | UAT Scripts & Feedback Reports            | 8 hours             | QA Lead, PM, End Users                      | Test environment must be available            | Users are trained on new features     |

| ACT-028         | Publish NPM Package                      | Package and publish the framework to npm, verify version and documentation.                                          | Published NPM Package                    | 4 hours              | Node.js Dev, Release Manager                | Must pass all tests and code reviews           | npm credentials are available         |
| ACT-029         | Release Admin Web Interface              | Deploy and validate the Next.js admin portal for enterprise users.                                                   | Deployed Admin Interface                  | 6 hours              | DevOps Engineer, Web Developer              | Admin portal must be production-ready          | All bugs are resolved                 |

### Activity Categories

- **Development Activities:** 13  
  (Implementation of AI Engine, Document Generator, API Server, Integration Modules, CLI/Web Admin, Workflow Automation, etc.)

- **Testing Activities:** 4  
  (Unit/Integration Testing, Provider Testing, Security/Compliance Testing, User Acceptance Testing)

- **Documentation Activities:** 4  
  (Project Documentation, Training Materials, Activity List, WBS Dictionary)

- **Management Activities:** 11  
  (Charter, Stakeholder Analysis, Requirements, Compliance, WBS, Scheduling, Estimates, Deployment, Release, Team Training, UAT Coordination)

---

*This Activity List ensures all project work for ADPA is decomposed into manageable, traceable, and actionable units, enabling efficient delivery, compliance, and stakeholder alignment.*
